dt: {bc}to deprive of vital content or force
{bc}to remove an organ from (a patient) or the contents of (an organ)
{bc}to protrude through a surgical incision or suffer protrusion of a part through an incision

et: Latin {it}evisceratus{/it}, past participle of {it}eviscerare{/it}, from {it}e-{/it} + {it}viscera{/it} viscera
shortdef: to take out the entrails of : disembowel
to deprive of vital content or force
to remove an organ from (a patient) or the contents of (an organ)
